segments.text: Thanks . Sometimes talking with a friend is a great way to get over something . Do you mind if I vent a little bit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . If you're feeling bad and want to let your emotions out , you can just say whatever you want to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , because I am really mad at William . I mean , what kind of an idiot wouldn't be able to appreciate a smart , beautiful woman like me ? Anybody who would be friends with that guy has to be really dumb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh , A ... you know I'm friends with William .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh right ... present company excluded , of course !
segments.speaker: S1
